message.entry: File {0} contains different number of variables or data types. All files must contain the same structure and formatting.
ReadSize must be a positive integer.
Invalid file type. At least one input file must be a {0}file that is an output of write method of tall.
The input files must be {0}files that are outputs of write method of tall.\nInvalid file: ''{1}''
The input files must be MAT-files or they must be Sequence files that are outputs of write method of tall.\nInvalid file: ''{0}''
